="NO" ISREUSABLE ="YES" ISSHAREREAD ="YES" ISSHAREWRITE ="YES" MAXLENGTH ="20971520" NAME ="Helper_Code_Snippet" VALUE ="// Auxiliary variable to assemble the output string:

StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder( 4000);

 

// The masking character string:

private String maskingChars =

 "OFHKIJDLACYGZWUMXBNRETQVSPofhkijdlacygzwumxbnretqvsp0319287546";

 

// current character in i_String:

char ch;

// its index in i_String;

int idx;

// The character resulting from the masking operation:

char cNew;

 

// Length of input string:

int len;

 

// Index of corresponding masked character or -1 if

// ch is not in "maskingChars":

int startOffset;

 

 
" VENDORNAME ="INFORMATICA"/> <METADATAEXTENSION COMPONENTVERSION ="1000000" DATATYPE ="STRING" DESCRIPTION ="" DOMAINNAME ="Java_Transform_Domain" ISCLIENTEDITABLE ="NO" ISCLIENTVISIBLE ="NO" MAXLENGTH ="2147483647" NAME ="Names_Of_Inner_Classes" VALUE ="" VENDORNAME ="INFORMATICA"/> <METADATAEXTENSION COMPONENTVERSION ="1000000" DATATYPE ="NUMERIC" DESCRIPTION ="" DOMAINNAME ="Java_Transform_Domain" ISCLIENTEDITABLE ="NO" ISCLIENTVISIBLE ="NO" ISREUSABLE ="YES" ISSHAREREAD ="YES" ISSHAREWRITE ="YES" MAXLENGTH ="0" NAME ="Num_of_Inner_Classes" VALUE ="0" VENDORNAME ="INFORMATICA"/> <METADATAEXTENSION COMPONENTVERSION ="1000000" DATATYPE ="STRING" DESCRIPTION ="" DOMAINNAME ="Java_Transform_Domain" ISCLIENTEDITABLE ="NO" ISCLIENTVISIBLE ="NO" ISREUSABLE ="YES" ISSHAREREAD ="YES" ISSHAREWRITE ="YES" MAXLENGTH ="20971520" NAME ="OnEndOfData_Method_Snippet" VALUE ="" VENDORNAME ="INFORMATICA"/> <METADATAEXTENSION COMPONENTVERSION ="1000000" DATATYPE ="STRING" DESCRIPTION ="" DOMAINNAME ="Java_Transform_Domain" ISCLIENTEDITABLE ="NO" ISCLIENTVISIBLE ="NO" ISREUSABLE ="YES" ISSHAREREAD ="YES" ISSHAREWRITE ="YES" MAXLENGTH ="20971520" NAME ="OnInputRow_Method_Snippet" VALUE ="if (isNull( "i_String"))

 setNull( "o_String");

else

{ sb .setLength( 0);

 len = i_String .length();

 for (idx = 0; idx < len; idx++)

 { ch = i_String .charAt( idx);

 if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')

 startOffset = 52;

 else if (ch >= 'A' && ch <= 'Z')

 startOffset = -10;

 else if (ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'z')

 startOffset = 16;

 else

 startOffset = -99;

 

 if (startOffset != -99)

 cNew = maskingChars .charAt( startOffset +

 Character .getNumericValue( ch));

 else

 cNew = ch;

 

 sb .append( cNew);

 } // for idx over all characters in "i_String"

 sb .setLength( len);

 o_String = sb .toString();

} // if "i_String" is not NULL

 

 " VENDORNAME ="INFORMATICA"/> <METADATAEXTENSION COMPONENTVERSION ="1000000" DATATYPE ="STRING" DESCRIPTION ="" DOMAINNAME ="Java_Transform_Domain" ISCLIENTEDITABLE ="NO" ISCLIENTVISIBLE ="NO"
